fact.description: The match has started.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Estadio do Maracana.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in France territory.
Throw-in France.
Free kick France.
Noumandiez Doue signals a Ecuador throw-in in France's half.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Corner awarded to France.
France have a goal kick.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France.
Ball safe as Ecuador is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ecuador at Estadio do Maracana.
In Rio de Janeiro France attack through Antoine Griezmann. The finish is off target, however.
Noumandiez Doue awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Noumandiez Doue signals a Ecuador throw-in in France's half.
France to take a throw-in in Ecuador territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
France's Moussa Sissoko is on target but unsuccessful.
Antonio Valencia returns to the field for Ecuador after picking up a slight injury.
The match at Estadio do Maracana is underway again.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ecuador needs to be cautious. France have an attacking throw-in.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Ecuador are coming forward and Enner Valencia gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Noumandiez Doue awards France a goal kick.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in France territory.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Noumandiez Doue signals a Ecuador throw-in in France's half.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Ecuador awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Ecuador awarded a free kick in their own half.
Noumandiez Doue waits before resuming play because Christian Noboa for Ecuador is still down.
Noumandiez Doue signals a France throw-in in Ecuador's half.
Noumandiez Doue has blown to resume play in Rio de Janeiro.
Christian Noboa is back on his feet again.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
France to take a throw-in in Ecuador territory.
The match is underway again.
Ecuador's Michael Arroyo gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
Ecuador have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for France!
Paul Pogba for France drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
France have been awarded a corner by Noumandiez Doue.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to Ecuador in their own half.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Noumandiez Doue signals a throw-in for Ecuador, close to France's area.
Ecuador push forward through Enner Valencia, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as France is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in France territory.
Free kick Ecuador.
In Rio de Janeiro France drive forward through Karim Benzema. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ecuador push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Enner Valencia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined France defence.
France have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Noumandiez Doue awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Throw-in for Ecuador in their own half.
Noumandiez Doue signals a France throw-in in Ecuador's half.
2 minutes will be added to the first half.
Antoine Griezmann (France) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Digne for France who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Ecuador are down to 10 men after Antonio Valencia has been shown a red card.
The match in Rio de Janeiro is underway once more.
Throw-in for France at Estadio do Maracana.
Ecuador's Christian Noboa looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in France.
Ecuador's Christian Noboa misses with an attempt on goal.
France have a goal kick.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Noumandiez Doue signals a Ecuador throw-in in France's half.
Goal kick for France at Estadio do Maracana.
Paul Pogba gets his shot on target but fails to score for France.
France have been awarded a corner by Noumandiez Doue.
Karim Benzema of France gets in a strike, but is off target.
Noumandiez Doue awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Raphael Varane is on a sub for Mamadou Sakho for France.
In Rio de Janeiro France drive forward through Blaise Matuidi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
France awarded a throw-in in their own half.
France are pushing forward but Moussa Sissoko's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Estadio do Maracana.
Ecuador make their first substitution with Renato Ibarra replacing Jefferson Montero.
Can France get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ecuador's half?
Ecuador to take a throw-in in France territory.
Karim Benzema (France) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to France.
Ecuador to take a throw-in in France territory.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France in their own half.
France drive upfield and Blaise Matuidi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ecuador defender.
Corner awarded to France.
Didier Deschamps (France) is making a second substitution, with Olivier Giroud replacing Blaise Matuidi.
France have been awarded a corner by Noumandiez Doue.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to Ecuador.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
France's Paul Pogba gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ecuador have a goal kick.
Ecuador have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to France.
Paul Pogba for France gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Ecuador goal kick.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ecuador at Estadio do Maracana.
Noumandiez Doue awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Throw-in for France in their own half.
Noumandiez Doue signals a Ecuador throw-in in France's half.
In Rio de Janeiro Ecuador's Enner Valencia is caught offside.
France awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
France drive forward and Karim Benzema gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
France to take a throw-in in Ecuador territory.
Loic Remy is on a sub for Antoine Griezmann for France.
Ecuador are coming forward and Michael Arroyo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for France at Estadio do Maracana.
Reinaldo Rueda is making the team's second substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Gabriel Achilier replacing Michael Arroyo.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France in their own half.
Frickson Erazo for Ecuador has been booked by Noumandiez Doue and receives a first yellow card.
France's Karim Benzema is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick Ecuador.
Ball goes out of play for a France goal kick.
Goal kick for Ecuador at Estadio do Maracana.
Paul Pogba of France gets in a strike, but is off target.
Noumandiez Doue awards Ecuador a goal kick.
Play has been resumed.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Alexander Dominguez, who is grimacing with pain.
Ecuador make their third substitution with Felipe Caicedo replacing Christian Noboa.
4 minutes will be added to the second half in Rio de Janeiro.
France's Lucas Digne is back in action after a slight knock.
Noumandiez Doue signals a free kick to France.
France's Olivier Giroud gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Ecuador is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Ecuador get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in France's half?
Ecuador have been awarded a corner by Noumandiez Doue.
That's full-time at Estadio do Maracana. The final score is 0-0.
